    "mst_platform_id": 2,

    },

        "apartment_name": "abc apartment",
        "street_name": "gandhi road",
        "landmark": "wer nagar",
        "area": "dum dum",
        "pincode": "7766889",
        "country": "India",
        "state": "West Bengal"
    },

        "imei2": "{{imei}}",
